ing: 1 (6.5 ounce) can minced clams, drained with juice reserved
des: "Minced clams are mixed with cream cheese and lightly flavored with spicy sauces. Serve this dip with chips at your next party. Don't be shellfish!"
ins: In a medium bowl, mix the cream cheese, minced clams, hot pepper sauce, Worcestershire sauce and black pepper. Blend in  the reserved clam juice a few drops at a time, until the dip reaches the desired consistency.
